title: [SRE] [Most Ranks] Looking for Staff/Players to Help Expanding Organization
body:
Hey all,
I'm the Manager and Founder of Storm Raisers Esports. I'm looking for a few people to help out in the organization, please read on if you're interested. We're thinking of branching out and making an Academy team, being Gold - Platinum team, we think having a full Gold (maybe high Silver team) would be reasonable for internal scrimmages, though we need more staff and players to make that happen. The following positions are open, requirements are listed below them:

**Coach for Main Squad:**
- Platinum 3+
- Have decent game knowledge, not just of macro but also most positions in micro.
- Be easy to work with (don't lose your temper at people who might not understand etc).

**Manager for Academy Team:**
- No Minimum Rank
- Must be able to commit to the team and put in time sorting out rosters and things of the like.
- Must also be easy to work with - toxicity is a big no in this organization.

**Coach for Academy Team:**
- Platinum 5+ (This may be relatively flexible depending on applications)
- Have decent game knowledge, not just of macro but also most positions in micro.
- Be easy to work with.

**Players for Academy Team:**
- Silver 2+ (Preferably Gold but will see how applicants go).
- Be willing to turn up to practices and improve themselves, not only as a player but also relationship-wise with the team.
- (In case you haven't noticed a pattern yet) Not Toxic. Again, Toxicity is a big no and isn't treated lightly in the org.

**If you're interested in any of the positions please message my Discord below:**

**Discord:** SRA Kekzii#1194

Thank you for taking the time to read this and I hope to hear back from you,
~ Mr Zeroxs, Founder of Storm Raisers Esports.
